scripts.build: echo 'Starting TypeScript compilation...' && tsc && echo 'TypeScript compilation complete' && echo 'Copying JSON files...' && mkdir -p dist/json && cp json/*.json dist/json/ && echo 'Build complete!'
scripts.verify: echo 'Verifying build...' && ls -la dist/ && echo 'Checking JSON files...' && ls -la dist/json/ || echo 'JSON directory not found'
